metadata.title: CVE-2018-16422 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A single byte buffer overflow when handling responses from an esteid Cardin sc_pkcs15emu_esteid_init in libopensc/pkcs15-esteid.c in OpenSC before0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards tocause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact.

criterions.comment: opensc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
